comment.author: 41234401@N03
comment._content:
This photo was taken in the ballroom of Rideau Hall (Government House) in Ottawa, the residence of the governor general.

Paul Robertson
Deseronto ON

comment.author: 38561291@N04
comment._content: I thought this was probably the case, but wasn't positive. Thanks for the info.
